page.title: 04CUBS AND THE ANGLING CLUB
page.content: {CUBS} The cubs are run by Mrs Robson (Akela) and Mrs Helsdone (Baloo) Cubs meet on Thursdays,6p.m. to 7.30p.m.,in Wylam church hall.There are about 20 cubs which are divided into four sixes,the red,blue,green and the yellow.The boys start at the age of 8 and leave at the age of 11. {THE ANGLING CLUB The club water is the river Tyne between the following limits.The north bank from Howaene Burn to the eastern end of Stephenson Terrace.The south bank from approximately 50 yards above the iron railway bridge to the junction of Stanley Burn with the river Tyne.The membership has now been limited due to overcrowding. However you can still buy day tickets.Plans are being made for a fishpass at Wylam
